column5: I just want to take a few moments to thank everyone, friends, guests, new ones, and old ones, for making this past season a good one for us at Horwood Lake Lodge.There were just a few unhappy folks(5), but considering the remaining 322 other happy friends we made in 2012, not a bad average..We will still try to make everyone that comes to visit with us happy..So, Happy Thanksgiving to our guests from the USA and happy ever after to our Canadian friends, EH? I thank each and everyone of you..Best wishes, from outfitterjoe, mr. Bill, michelle, stewart, max, and of course the camp dogs, max and hope!!
